results.title: [THE COMBINED THERAPY IN HYPERTENSIVE PATIENTS WITH DYSLIPIDEMIA].
results.text_hl: The combined therapy by @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine_Valsartan_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068838 @@@Exforge@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Fibric_Acids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D058607 @@@fibrates@@@ provides effective decrease in levels of blood pressure and improvement in @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ range in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Dyslipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Tabukashvili R, Kapetivadze V, Tchaava K, Gegeshidze N, Lazashvili T, Maglapheridze Z. [THE COMBINED THERAPY IN HYPERTENSIVE PATIENTS WITH DYSLIPIDEMIA]. Georgian Med News. 2018 Sep;(282):87-91. PMID: 30358547
